# Class LLM

Class for interacting with Language Models (LLMs). Provides functionality to generate text using prompts or message sequences.

##### Index

### Methods

destroy generateContent generateContentStream generateText

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this LLM.

#### Returns void




### generateContent

  * generateContent(  
props: {  
config: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface);  
messages: [LLMMessageInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.LLMMessageInterface)[];  
tools?: [ToolInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.ToolInterface)[];  
},  
): Promise<[ContentStreamIterator](/interfaces/common_stream_content.ContentStreamIterator)>

Generates content based on messages with optional tool calling support. This is the advanced API that supports structured content with tool calls.

#### Parameters

    * props: {  
config: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface);  
messages: [LLMMessageInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.LLMMessageInterface)[];  
tools?: [ToolInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.ToolInterface)[];  
}

Configuration for content generation

      * ##### config: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface)

Configuration parameters for text generation

      * ##### messages: [LLMMessageInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.LLMMessageInterface)[]

Array of message objects for chat-like interactions

      * ##### `Optional`tools?: [ToolInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.ToolInterface)[]

Optional array of tools that the model may call

#### Returns Promise<[ContentStreamIterator](/interfaces/common_stream_content.ContentStreamIterator)>

A stream iterator for the generated content (text + tool calls)

#### Throws

InworldError if messages are not provided, or generation fails




### generateContentStream

  * generateContentStream(  
props: {  
config: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface);  
messages: [LLMMessageInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.LLMMessageInterface)[];  
tools?: [ToolInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.ToolInterface)[];  
},  
): Promise<[ContentStreamIterator](/interfaces/common_stream_content.ContentStreamIterator)>

Generates content stream based on messages with optional tool calling support. This method returns a content stream that can contain both text and tool calls.

#### Parameters

    * props: {  
config: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface);  
messages: [LLMMessageInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.LLMMessageInterface)[];  
tools?: [ToolInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.ToolInterface)[];  
}

Configuration for content generation

      * ##### config: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface)

Configuration parameters for text generation

      * ##### messages: [LLMMessageInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.LLMMessageInterface)[]

Array of message objects for chat-like interactions

      * ##### `Optional`tools?: [ToolInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.ToolInterface)[]

Optional array of tools that the model may call

#### Returns Promise<[ContentStreamIterator](/interfaces/common_stream_content.ContentStreamIterator)>

A content stream iterator for the generated content (text + tool calls)

#### Throws

InworldError if messages are not provided, or generation fails




### generateText

  * generateText(  
props: {  
config: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface);  
messages?: [LLMMessageInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.LLMMessageInterface)[];  
prompt?: string;  
},  
): Promise<[ContentStreamIterator](/interfaces/common_stream_content.ContentStreamIterator)>

Generates text based on a prompt or message sequence. This method now uses ContentStream to be consistent with other LLM methods.

#### Parameters

    * props: {  
config: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface);  
messages?: [LLMMessageInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.LLMMessageInterface)[];  
prompt?: string;  
}

Configuration for text generation

      * ##### config: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface)

Configuration parameters for text generation

      * ##### `Optional`messages?: [LLMMessageInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.LLMMessageInterface)[]

Optional array of message objects for chat-like interactions

      * ##### `Optional`prompt?: string

Optional text prompt to use for generation

#### Returns Promise<[ContentStreamIterator](/interfaces/common_stream_content.ContentStreamIterator)>

A content stream iterator for the generated content (text + potential tool calls)

#### Throws

InworldError if neither prompt nor messages are provided, or generation fails
